Module com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.internal
Package com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.internal.net

Class FilterDatagramSocket

java.lang.Object
java.net.DatagramSocket
com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.internal.net.FilterDatagramSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DtlsDatagramSocket
public class FilterDatagramSocket extends DatagramSocket
A DatagramSocket that contains some other DatagramSocket used as a source of data, possibly transforming the data along the way or providing additional functionality. The class FilterDatagramSocket itself simply overrides all methods of DatagramSocket with versions that pass all requests to the contained DatagramSocket. Subclasses of FilterDatagramSocket may further override some of these methods and may also provide additional methods and fields.

      protected DatagramSocket datagramSocket

  • Constructor Details

    • FilterDatagramSocket

      public FilterDatagramSocket(DatagramSocket datagramSock) throws SocketException
      Constructs an unbound FilterDatagramSocket with the provided DatagramSocket to be filtered.
      Parameters:
      datagramSock - the provided DatagramSocket to be filtered
      Throws:
      SocketException - if the FilterDatagramSocket can not be opened, or the FilterDatagramSocket could not bind to the specified local port (which in either case will not happen since the FilterDatagramSocket is neither opened nor bound)
